short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Finds You The Highest Cash Back Rate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The RebatesMe Browser Extension helps you find the best promo codes, active coupons, and the highest cashback rates available!
Save money and earn cash back at over 7,500 stores with just a click.

By installing the extension you agree to the Cash Back Button Terms & Conditions：
https://rebatesme.zohodesk.com/portal/en/kb/articles/rebatesme-browser-extension-terms

How It Works

Shop at 7,500+ Stores
Start earning cash back at your favorite stores like Macy’s, Finish Line, Sephora, Walmart, and more.

Easily Activate Cash Back
Click "Activate" on the offer you want. Wherever you shop online, the extension will automatically show you the highest cashback rates and best offers. Activate it with one click, then shop as usual.

Stay Updated with the Latest Deals
Never miss a discount! The extension continuously updates you with the latest offers and discount codes while you browse, ensuring you always get the best deal.

Automatically Apply Coupons
Click “Apply Coupons” at checkout to find and apply the best available coupon automatically.

Earn Cash Back
Your earnings will automatically sync to your RebatesMe account once you complete your purchase.

Get the Best Deals and Cash Back Rates Today！
